httpdocs
Table of Contents

PostAccounts

With Connect, you can create Stripe accounts for your users.

To do this, you’ll first need to register your platform.

If you’ve already collected information for your connected accounts, you can pre-fill that information when creating the account. Connect Onboarding won’t ask for the pre-filled information during account onboarding. You can pre-fill any information on the account.

HTTP Request

POST \v1\accounts HTTP/1.1
host: api.stripe.com:443
eTag: "23423432"
accept: application/json
content-type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded

{ "example": "Example goes here" }

Parameters

Request Body Schema

{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "account_token": {
      "maxLength": 5000,

      "description": "An account token, used to securely provide details to the account."

For example, if you are in the United States and the business for which you're creating an account is legally represented in Canada, you would use CA as the country for the account being created. Available countries include Stripe's global markets as well as countries where cross-border payouts are supported."
